metadata.description:
143 pages!

Dignifying Science, the second in a series telling true stories about scientists, is back in print! This volume features famous women scientists including Marie Curie, mathematician Emmy Noether, physicist Lise Meitner, DNA researcher Rosalind Franklin, biologist Barbara McClintock, primatologist Birute Galdikas, and Hedy Lamarr.
metadata.name: Dignifying Science: Stories About Women Scientists
